sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core'
import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip'
import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'
import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'
import EmployeesView from '../EmployeesPage'
import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'

const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
    card: {
        height: '200px',
        margin: '10px',
        width: '200px',
        borderRadius: '10px',
        boxShadow: '0 5px 40px -12px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)',
        transition: '0.1s',
        '&:hover button' : {
            boxShadow: '0 10px 70px -12.125px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)',
            opacity: '1',
        }
    },
    cardTop: {
        height: '200px',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        textAlign: 'center',
        margin:'auto',
        alignContent: 'center',
        fontSize: '18px',
    },
    cardBottom: {
        height: '50px',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        textAlign: 'center',
        margin:'auto',
        alignContent: 'center',
        // backgroundColor: theme.palette.primary.light,
    },
    cardBack: {
        height: '250px',
        width: '200px',
        margin: '10px',
        marginTop:'-25px',
        marginBottom:'-25px',
        borderRadius: '10px',
        boxShadow: '0 10px 70px -12.125px rgba(0,0,0,0.8)',
    },
    flipButton: {
        opacity: 0,
        transition: '0.1s',
        height: '20px',
        width: '70px',
        fontSize: '10px',
        top: '130px',
    },
}))

const EmployeeCard = ({employee}) => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState()

    return (
        <ReactCardFlip isFlipped={isFlipped} flipDirection='vertical'>

            <Card className={classes.card}>
                <Container className={classes.cardTop}>
                    {employee.firstName} {employee.lastName}
                    <Divider light/>
                    <Button className={classes.flipButton} style={{marginBottom:'2rem'}} onClick={() => setIsFlipped(!isFlipped)}>Flip Card</Button>
                </Container>
                <Container className={classes.cardBottom}>
                </Container>
            </Card>
            <Card className={classes.cardBack}>
                <Button className={classes.flipButton} onClick={() => setIsFlipped(!isFlipped)}>Flip Card</Button>
            </Card>
        </ReactCardFlip>
    )
}

export default EmployeeCard
